Name: Wild Seeds Summer
Description:
An assortment of wild spring seeds.
(Note: The crafted item is called "Spring Seeds." The recipe produces 10 seeds per craft.)

Name: Wild Seeds Spring
Description:
An assortment of wild summer seeds.
(Note: The crafted item is called "Summer Seeds." The recipe produces 10 seeds per craft.)

Name: Wild Seeds Fall
Description:
An assortment of wild fall seeds.
(Note: The crafted item is called "Fall Seeds." The recipe produces 10 seeds per craft.)
Recipe: Common Mushroom(1), Wild Plum(1), Hazelnut(1), Blackberry(1)

Name: Wild Seeds Winter
Description:
An assortment of wild winter seeds.
(Note: The crafted item is called "Winter Seeds." The recipe produces 10 seeds per craft.)
Recipe: Winter Root(1), Crystal Fruit(1), Snow Yam(1), Crocus(1)

Name: Grass Starter
Description: Place this on your farm to start a new patch of grass.

Name: Tea Sapling
Description: Takes 20 days to mature. Produces tea leaves during the final week of each season, except winter. No watering necessary!
Source: Mail the day after Caroline's 2-heart event

Name: Fiber Seeds
Description: Plant these in any season. Does not require watering. Harvest with the scythe. Takes 7 days to grow.
